== Kumaramangalam (Part) (628084) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kumaramangalam (Part) is a village in the [[Thodupuzha]] taluka of [[Idukki ]] district with an area of 2064 hectares and harbouring 3669 households with total population of 15522 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thodupuzha]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 7784 and female population is 7738. Scheduled Caste Population is 1114 and Scheduled Tribes population is 63. Census Location Code of the village is 628084<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 567 (3.65%)
* Literate male population: 299 (3.84%)
* Literate female population: 268 (3.46%)
